page.title: 13Employment, Scoutmoor.
page.content: The area is one relying mainly on sheep farming.But today farming has declined and the recent recent influx of professional people (Solicitors, Doctors) has changed the infra-structure.Now many people travel to the nearby towns and cities (Bury, Manchester.) An old mill has been converted for private enterprises including T.V.rentals, rehearsals studios gear box repair and an onyx works, which imports the raw material from Pakistan and Mexico. Quarries exist in the area, now re-opened and providing employment. Contractors are busy rebuilding the road linking the quarry to the main road. Volunteer groups are used to maintain the walks, dry stone walls and countryside.
